roleset.name: appear, as from underwater

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Great Northern surged 20 1/8 to 62 7/8, well above Georgia-Pacific's offering price of $58 a share, amid speculation that other suitors for the company would surface or that the bid would be raised.

roleset.note: SURFACE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'surface' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'appear'. (from surface.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: put atop, apply a surface to

example.name: passive
example.text: The panels are like [oversized semiconductors]-1 surfaced *trace*-1 with a million or more picture elements, each contributing to the color and tone of a TV image.
example.arg: with a million or more picture elements, each contributing to the color and tone of a TV image.

roleset.note: SURFACE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'surface' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'appear'. (from surface.02-v predicate notes)
